r_pfft.h

00001 // public fftpatcher struct
00002 
00003 #if C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACKPUSH
00004     #pragma pack(push, 2)
00005 #elif C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACK
00006     #pragma pack(2)
00007 #endif
00008 
00009 #define JPFFT //just so we can have the jpatcher and old patcher code side by side for a little while
00010 
00011 #ifdef JPFFT
00012 #define t_patcherobject t_object
00013 #else
00014 #define t_patcherobject t_patcher
00015 #endif
00016 
00017 typedef struct _pfftpub
00018 {
00019     t_pxobject x_obj;
00020     t_patcherobject *x_parent;  // parent patcher
00021     t_patcherobject *x_patcher;// patcher loaded
00022     struct _dspchain *x_chain;  // dsp chain within pfft
00023     
00024     long x_fftsize;             // fft frame size
00025     long x_ffthop;              // hop between  fft frames
00026     long x_fftoffset;           // n samples offset before fft is started
00027     long x_fftindex;            // current index into fft frame 
00028     short x_fullspect;          // process half-spectrum (0) or full mirrored spectrum (1)?
00029     
00030 } t_pfftpub;
00031 
00032 #if C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACKPUSH
00033     #pragma pack(pop)
00034 #elif C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACK
00035     #pragma pack()
00036 #endif
